name: Beepertron
description:
Beepertron is a little musical game, reminiscent of the old electronic toy, Simon Says. The computer plays a short melody, up to 10 notes, on the on-screen piano, and then the player must play the same melody using the computer keyboard. After 7 false notes, the game is over.

The subtitle "1 bit music game" is due to the fact that the standard MSX sound generator isn't used, instead all tones are generated with the small keyclick circuit.
